ITEM.SHORT_TXT: Function Group for update task actions

RAW.SOURCE: ` *"---------------------------------------------------------------------- *"*"Update Function Module: *" *"*"Local Interface: *"---------------------------------------------------------------------- * This FM doesn't do anything, this is just to release lock on commit that this FM is called in update task

ITEM.SHORT_TXT: FM to be called in update task : Doesn't do anything

RAW.SOURCE: ` CHECK f_commit_to_do IS INITIAL. " Set Update task function only once CALL FUNCTION 'YGPL_DO_NOTHING' IN UPDATE TASK. " This call ensure that commit will release lock f_commit_to_do = abap_true. PERFORM clear_flag ON COMMIT.

ITEM.SHORT_TXT: FM to to release lock on commit

ITEM.NAME: TOP
ITEM.SOURCE:
` FUNCTION-POOL [FUNCTIONGROUP NAME]. "MESSAGE-ID ..
TYPE-POOLS: abap.
DATA f_commit_to_do TYPE abap_bool.
